cause.description:
This cause is dedicated to putting Paris Hilton in jail. She is a menace to society. She is a terrible role model to other dumb and retarded girls who ave nothing going but looks and their daddy's wallet. She is also a danger on the road, and is going to kill somebody soon if not herself.
1. Make Paris take some responsibilty for her actions
2. At least pretend like celeberties don't get preferential treatment
3. Tell this stupid bitch just how stupid she really is
cause.mission: Keep Paris off the road and off TV and out of our lives
cause.name: Put Paris Behind Bars
